monster.languages: Dwarvish, Thieves' cant, Plus any one language (Common)

trait.name: Assassinate
trait.text: During its first turn, Andras has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. Any hit Andras scores against a surprised creature is a critical hit.

trait.name: Dwarven Resilience
trait.text: The dwarf has advantage on saving throws against poison.

trait.name: Evasion
trait.text: If Andras is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, Andras instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
trait.text: Andras deals an extra 14 (4d6) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Andras that isn't incapacitated and Andras doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.
